snippet.title: UnearthU — Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming Spring 2021 to Steam, iOS, Android, and itch.io

UnearthU is a 7 day multimedia experience about self-improvement, healing, and transformation. Made using all digitally recycled materials, the game consists of found footage videos, discussions with an A.I., guided meditations, writing reflection prompts, and a habit tracker.

Kara Stone -- Creator --  https://karastonesite.com/​
Parul Wadhwa -- Co-writer -- https://www.parulwadhwa.com/​
Andy DiLallo -- Composer -- https://andydilallo.com/​
Chris Kerich -- Programmer -- http://www.ckerich.com/​

Part of the label Ice Water Games -- http://www.icewatergames.com/

The images are public domain, sourced from Prelinger Library, National Film Board of Canada, Pad.ma, Gray's Anatomy, and Good's Family Flora and Materia Medica Botanica.
